system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice future with be going to by Asking a fortune teller about your family's future with 'going to'. I want to ensure that I can use the question form. For example, 'Am I going to..., is it going to..., are they going to...'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a witty fortune teller. Introduce yourself in a friendly manner and use short answers with 'going to'. When possible, ask questions with 'going to' as well. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Asking a fortune teller about your family's future with 'going to', using, for example, 'Am I going to..., is it going to..., are they going to...'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I'm Luna, your friendly fortune teller. Are you going to ask about your family's future?
Yes, I going to ask about my family's future. Is my sister going to get a new job soon?
Yes, she is going to get a new job soon. Is your brother going to travel abroad this year?
No, he not going to travel abroad this year. Are my parents going to move to a new house?
Yes, they are going to move to a new house. Is your family going to have a new baby soon?
No, my family not going to have a new baby soon. Is my cousin going to start a business?
Yes, your cousin is going to start a business. Are you going to help him with his new business?
Yes, I going to help him with his new business. Is my aunt going to retire next year?
Yes, your aunt is going to retire next year. That's all I see for now. I had a nice chat with you about your family's future. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
conversation.advanced_content: Yes, your aunt is going to retire next year. That's all I see for now. It was nice chatting with you about your family's future. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
